name: Doug DeGroot
biography: Doug DeGroot is a Professor of Instruction in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Texas at Dallas. He serves as the Director of the Center for Applied AI & Machine Learning. Doug has a strong background in artificial intelligence and machine learning, with a focus on developing tools and products that leverage these technologies. He has received various accolades for his contributions to the field.
notable_publications: An approach to using actual audio and video clips of real humans to construct artificial, conversational agents and bots.
Machine Learning Techniques for Bioinformatics Applications.
research_focus: Artificial intelligence, machine learning, and their applications in developing conversational agents and bioinformatics.
